segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, she looks so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, it's creating a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the floor must be really slippery by now, someone could slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, he's really reaching for those cookies in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl waiting patiently, she looks so hopeful and innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman hasn't noticed the water yet, it's right there in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip over, the boy could really get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside through the window, it looks so calm and tidy compared to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water streaming down the cabinets, it's making everything wet and messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really be more aware of her surroundings, the kids could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
